name: Breakout (itch) (Saffron Streams // Comedy Reflux)
description:
Breakout is a two-player, one-keyboard game.

Protips: 

- The scientist needs to operate the levers and then push the button (on the other console) to activate a gate.

- The specimen can do a mental attack when it gets to a shut gate by pushing the action button. Then both players need to act quickly and often in the ensuing mental battle.
